review.title: “very bad”
review.pros: Pros – newly born organization that needs hard-work and devotion.
review.cons: Cons – Poor management system. Poor span of control, Poor Marketing skills, immature approach of Business
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – There must be a hierarchical control, there must be a competent marketing and sales representative. Responsibilities must not be taken for granted or only by some of the people
